dc_title_s: Maryland-Washington Regional District, Current Boundary: Prince George's County, Maryland
dc_description_s: The current boundary of the Maryland-Washington Regional District, as defined by Article 28, Section 7-103 of the Maryland Annotated Code, last amended by Chapter 627 of House Bill 639 of 2013; providing for the planning and zoning and subdivision control over land included in the boundaries of the Maryland-Washington Regional District, which excludes the municipality of Laurel. The Regional District is used to claculate the assessable base for the Administration Fund portion of the M-NCPPC tax rate; the Metrpolitan District Bouandry is used to calculate the Park Fund and the Entire County is used to calculate the Recreation Fund and Advanced Land Acquisition (ALA) Fund. This coverage, developed and maintained by the Planning Department, is suitable for presentation at a scale of 1:12,000. Boundaries which are not associated with road rights-of-way are shown in their approximate location. This coverage is not suitable for the identification of individual parcels.
dc_creator_sm: The Maryland-National Capital Park & Planning Commission - Prince George's County
